results.content:
I love Brad and his tutorials, but unfortunately this course barely scratches the surface of Auth0, and provides surface level instructions that are a little out of date and can be found in the Auth0 documentation. I typically used courses as references while I work, but this doesn't really provide value as a reference, and since the course is so short, simply spending an hour with it makes in ineligible for a refund.

I still recommend Brads other courses as he does provide helpful insight, but this course simply falls short.

results.content: The course is older, not using angular CLI.
